Startup.title: Proprietorship
Startup.content: A Proprietorship is a business owned and operated by a single individual.

Startup.title: Partnership
Startup.content: A Partnership is a business owned by two or more individuals.

Startup.title: One Person Company
Startup.content: An One Person Company (OPC) is a new type of company in India where only one person can hold the entire shareholding.

Startup.title: Limited Liability Partnership
Startup.content: An LLP is a business structure that combines the benefits of a partnership and a company.

Startup.title: Private Limited Company
Startup.content: A Private Limited Company is a type of company that is privately owned and offers limited liability to its owners.

Startup.title: Section 8 Company
Startup.content: A Section 8 Company is a non-profit organization registered under the Companies Act 2013 in India.

Startup.title: Public Limited Company
Startup.content: A Public Limited Company is a company whose shares are publicly traded on the stock exchange.

Registration.title: Company Registration
Registration.content: We assist you in registering your company with complete legal compliance and documentation.

Registration.title: Startup India
Registration.content: Startup India initiative by the Indian Government promotes innovation through benefits for startups.

Registration.title: Trade License
Registration.content: Obtain your trade license quickly and hassle-free to comply with municipal regulations.

Registration.title: FSSAI Registration
Registration.content: Essential for businesses in the food sector to ensure hygiene and safety compliance.

Registration.title: FSSAI License
Registration.content: Get your FSSAI License to run your food business legally with proper food safety approvals.

Registration.title: TN RERA Registration for Agents
Registration.content: Mandatory for real estate agents in Tamil Nadu to operate legally under RERA.

Registration.title: 12A and 80G Registration

Registration.content: Secure 12A registration to gain tax exemption status for your NGO.

GST.content: Generate and manage GST-compliant e-invoices using our easy-to-use software.

GST.content: File your GST LUT (Letter of Undertaking) to export goods and services without paying IGST.
